text: Samuele Cerro (born 21 March 1995) is an Italian triple jumper. ==Biography== Cerro was a finalist at the 2017 European Athletics U23 Championships. In July 2019, he was a finalist at the Summer Universiade and then he won the national title at the Italian Championships in Brixen. ==Personal best== *Triple jump: 16.59 m (Agropoli, june 2019) ==National titles== * Italian Athletics Championships ** Triple jump: 2019 ==See also== * Italy at the 2019 Summer Universiade ==References== ==External links== * *Samuele Cerro at FIDAL Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male triple jumpers Category:Italian Athletics Championships winners Category:Competitors at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Samuele Cerro
